controller

Class CatController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CatController

  • public class CatController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the categories. This class would contain the database connection for the categories in a full implementation of the system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CatController

        public CatController()
        Constructor. Creates 4 categories when initialized and adds them to an arraylist of categories.

    • Method Detail

      • catExists

        public int catExists(java.lang.String cat)
        Checks if a category exists.
        Parameters:
        cat - The name of the category to be checked
        Returns:
        the index of the category if category name exists as an int. If not, -1 is returned as an int.

      • getCategoryNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCategoryNames()
        Gets all the category names.
        Returns:
        category names as an arraylist of strings

      • renameCategory

        public boolean renameCategory(java.lang.String cat,
                              java.lang.String name)
        Renames a specific category to a new name if that category exists.
        Parameters:
        cat - the category that should be renamed as a string
        name - the new name of the category as a string
        Returns:
        boolean, true if success, else false

      • removeCategory

        public int removeCategory(java.lang.String cat)
        Removes a category
        Parameters:
        cat - the name of the category to be removed as a string
        Returns:
        1 as an integer if success, else -1

        Returns:
